Sample Sizes

game_teams_truncated.csv
    We used a sample size of 375 randomly selected rows out of a data set containing 14,882
instances of game_teams, giving us 95% confidence that we cover our sample parameters with a margin of error of 5.

For games_truncated.csv
    We used a sample size of 365 randomly selected rows out of a data set containing 7,442
instances of games, giving us 95% confidence that we cover our sample parameters with a margin of error of 5.
